component.description: PrimeFaces features a resizable component that has the ability to make a JSF component resizable. Resizable can be used on various components like resize an input fields, panels, menus, images and more.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
for false java.lang.String Identifier of the target component to make resizable.
aspectRatio false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if aspectRatio should be kept or not. Default is false.
proxy false java.lang.Boolean false Displays proxy element instead of actual element.
handles false java.lang.String Specifies the resize handles.
ghost false java.lang.Boolean false In ghost mode, resize helper is displayed as the original element with less opacity. Default is false.
animate false java.lang.Boolean false Enables animation. Default is false.
effect false java.lang.String swing Effect to use in animation. Default is swing.
effectDuration false java.lang.String normal Effect duration of animation. Default is normal.
maxWidth false java.lang.Integer Integer.MAX_VALUE Maximum width boundary in pixels. Default is max integer value.
maxHeight false Integer.MAX_VALUE java.lang.Integer Maximum height boundary in pixels. Default is max integer value.
minWidth false java.lang.Integer Integer.MIN_VALUE Minimum width boundary in pixels. Default is min integer value.
minHeight false Integer.MIN_VALUE java.lang.Integer Maximum height boundary in pixels. Default is min integer value.
containment false false java.lang.Boolean Sets resizable boundaries as the parents size. Default is false.
grid false 1 java.lang.Integer Snaps resizing to grid structure. Default is 1.
onStart false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when resizing begins.
onResize false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute during resizing.
onStop false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute after resizing end.
